Text:
Change Log:

Fixed: Error, unable to load .bin / steam / steam.dll
Uncorrected differences versions of texts
Fixed switching offline
Fixed game engine GoldSrc after updating
Fixed server crack for games on the engine GoldSrc after updating
Added some missing DLC
So 300 games is a bit of an exaggeration more like 142. But its working properly and ill leave another comment as soon as I get my first update. Good on ya mate.
Question. Please forgive me if this is noobish but will Greenluma work for this? Or is it best just to wait for the updates?
is this safe to use? because i dont want to be sued. lol
Im worried that i may be caught, and i was also wondering if you could download the expansion Rift: Storm Legion
Hoping for a quick response because this looks very appealing...
If i were you I wound't get this to play rift. Just buy the expansion. But if your wanting to play other games then this is perfect.

alright, but what are the chances for me being sued for using this?
or jailed...
Btw, I'm impressed with the quick response :D
and one other thing that has been making me worry ALOT, can i get fined/sued from downloading from this site?

Just make a new account if you're scared. 

Any games with server or license errors mean you need the .NCF and .GCF files. Google is your friend.
were are those? I ended up downloading it, but i am getting that "no license" error.
PLEASE MY FRIEND HELP ME!I can download only a few games...:( In most games I have an error when I try to download them.(sorry for my bad english)
This dont even look safe... and I dont mean a virus I mean getting sued or locked up kind of not safe
